description: This file defines a React page component for an order tracking interface in a food delivery web app. It includes components for displaying order status timeline, a placeholder for a live map, and the main page component that loads order info via API, subscribes to WebSocket updates for real-time status, and displays order details and progress.

classes.name: OrderStatusTimeline
classes.description: React component that displays a timeline of status steps for an order, highlighting current step and completion status.

classes.name: LiveMapPlaceholder
classes.description: React component that displays a stylized placeholder for a live delivery map with some delivery info.

methods.name: OrderTrackingPage
methods.description: Main React page component that loads order details, manages real-time updates via WebSocket, and renders order status, map placeholder, and order summary.
